Title: Relates to drivers of school buses using hands-free mobile telephones
Summary: Prohibits drivers of school buses that are carrying students from using hands-free mobile telephones and provides for certain exceptions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1225-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to drivers of school buses that are carrying students using hands-free mobile telephones
